amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-19 to make it unlawful to discriminate against an employee for inquiring or discussing with the employer why the wages of the employee are set at a certain rate or salary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
